thread.title: Re-live: Miracle saves stop rampant United
thread.title_full: Re-live: Miracle saves stop rampant United

title: Re-live: Miracle saves stop rampant United
text:
Live Premier League: Manchester United v Hull, Manchester City v West Ham Staff writers, FOX SPORTS February 2, 2017 8:56am 
MANCHESTER United have spurned a chance to make up ground on the top four, held to a scoreless draw at home by Hull City. 
Goalkeeper Eldin Jakupovic pulled off two incredible saves to prevent United from breaking the deadlock, in a performance that was described as the “night of his life”. 
First, in the dying moments before half time, a reflex save stopped Paul Pogba from finishing off a fine pass from Zlatan Ibrahimovic. Then, midway through the second half, Jakupovic got down quickly to stop Juan Mata from scoring from a metre out. 
Then, in dramatic late scenes, Hull had two chances to seal the shock result on the counter attack – with Liverpool loanee Lazar Markovic striking the inside of the post and striker Abel Hernandez tamely shooting straight at David De Gea after a three on one breakaway. 
Re-live all the action in the blog below!
